WRITING.TITLE: Turkish Man Pushes Old Armenian Man Into Traffic Breaking His Legs

WRITING.TEXT: How does the maintenance records look? that is very important for a car with 100k miles!

WRITING.TITLE: 2011 Honda Accord 2.4 LX Sedan (Fleet in auto check) advice please
WRITING.TEXT: I am looking to purchase this honda with 39,000 miles for about 13k the auto check looked good except it was used as rental at one point. Still the price is really good and the mileage is very low any advice ?
